howItWorks.title: Simple Process
howItWorks.subtitle: How IdeaVest Works
howItWorks.description: Our streamlined process ensures that great ideas get recognized, valued, and funded.

step1.title: Submit Your Idea
step1.description: Idea holders register and submit their innovations with detailed descriptions and any relevant attachments.

step2.title: Expert Evaluation
step2.description: Our expert panel reviews the submission and provides a detailed valuation and price estimation.

step3.title: Admin Approval
step3.description: Administrators verify the idea, ensure compliance with platform guidelines, and approve it for listing.

step4.title: Investor Discovery
step4.description: Approved ideas become visible to investors who can search and filter based on various criteria.

step5.title: Secure Agreements
step5.description: Interested investors sign a digital copyright agreement to access detailed idea information.

agreement.title: Investment Agreement
agreement.description: Please review the terms and sign the agreement below.
agreement.purposeText: The purpose of this Agreement is to establish the terms and conditions under which the Investor will provide funding for the development of the idea titled "{{title}}" (the "Project").
agreement.investmentAmountText: The Investor agrees to invest the sum of ${{amount}} (the "Investment Amount") in the Project.
agreement.ownershipText: In consideration for the Investment Amount, the Investor shall receive a 30% ownership stake in the Project and shall be entitled to 30% of all profits generated by the Project.
agreement.governanceText: Major decisions regarding the Project shall require the approval of both the Investor and the Idea Owner.
agreement.termText: This Agreement shall remain in effect until terminated by mutual agreement of the parties or as provided herein.
agreement.confidentialityText: Both parties agree to maintain the confidentiality of all proprietary information related to the Project.
agreement.signaturesText: By signing below, both parties acknowledge that they have read, understood, and agree to be bound by the terms and conditions set forth in this Agreement.
